body:
Hey everyone my name is Max and I'm (fairly) new to Avicus!
I joined about four months ago but I did not stay on Avicus very long because of the games it had (It was before this Avicore update).
However, I now think that Avicus is a terrific server and I really look forward to spending more time on it!
In regards to my username; this account was originally vladthegreat100's, but he gave it to me because my parents would not let me buy an account of my own unfortunately.

Anyways guys, I really hope to meet a lot of you, and I look forward to seeing you all in-game!!
Please ask me anything!

title: Hi I'm Max! AMA

replies.body:
1) Whats your (full) name?
2) How old are you?
3) Whats your Birthday?
4) What starsign does that make it?
5) Whats your favourite colour?
6) Whats your lucky number?
7) Do you have any pets?
8) Where are you from?
9) How tall are you?
10) What shoe size are you?
11) How many pairs of shoes do you own?
12) If you were prime miniser/ruler of the world what laws would you make?
13) If you were a super hero what powers would you have?
14) and what would your hero name be?
15) and what outfit would you wear?16) What was your last dream about?
17) What would you do if you won the lottery?
18) Would you like to build/design your own house?
19) Which form of public transport do you prefer?
20) What talents do you have?
21) Can you juggle?
22) Can you solve a rubix cube?
23) Do you have a cherished childhood teddybear?
24) Are you psychic in any way?
25) Are you a good dancer?

More coming after these if you want 'em.

replies.body:
1) Whats your (full) name? Maximus TheLlama 
2) How old are you? 16
3) Whats your Birthday? February 32
4) What starsign does that make it? WTF
5) Whats your favourite colour? Blue
6) Whats your lucky number? 3
7) Do you have any pets? A dog in another country
8) Where are you from? UK / Canada
9) How tall are you? 5'10
10) What shoe size are you? 11 I think
11) How many pairs of shoes do you own? No clue
12) If you were prime miniser/ruler of the world what laws would you make? Not too sure at the moment..
13) If you were a super hero what powers would you have? Flight
14) and what would your hero name be? Llama Man
15) and what outfit would you wear? A big llama costume
16) What was your last dream about? YOU
17) What would you do if you won the lottery? Buy 1000's of llamas
18) Would you like to build/design your own house? Yes!
19) Which form of public transport do you prefer? Riding llama's
20) What talents do you have? I breed llama's
21) Can you juggle? I juggle llama's
22) Can you solve a rubix cube? Yes
23) Do you have a cherished childhood teddybear? No.........but I have a llama
24) Are you psychic in any way? I am good at reading people's facial expressions
25) Are you a good dancer? Yes; taught by a professional llama.
